text: The following is a list of Interstate highways in the U.S. state of Nevada. All active mainline Interstates are maintained by the Nevada Department of Transportation, except for a portion of Interstate 215. Interstate business loops are only state-maintained where they overlap with an active State Route or U.S. route. __TOC__ ==Main routes== ==Business routes== ==See also== *List of U.S. Routes in Nevada *List of state routes in Nevada ==References== ==External links== *Nevada Highways @ AARoads *Nevada Department of Transportation Interstate
title: List of Interstate Highways in Nevada
